com.pi4j.component.servo

Interface ServoProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PCA9685GpioServoProvider, RPIServoBlasterProvider

    public interface ServoProvider
    This interface allows factory to create/cache ServoDriver objects.
    Author:
    Daniel Sendula

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Pin> getDefinedServoPins()
      This method returns a list of pins this provider implementation can drive.
      ServoDriver getServoDriver(Pin servoPin)
      This method returns a ServoDriver for asked pin.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefinedServoPins

        List<Pin> getDefinedServoPins()
                       throws IOException
        This method returns a list of pins this provider implementation can drive.
        Returns:
        list of pins
        Throws:
        IOException - in case there is an error providing list of pins

      • getServoDriver

        ServoDriver getServoDriver(Pin servoPin)
                    throws IOException
        This method returns a ServoDriver for asked pin. It may return IOException in case that driver does not know of asked pin or cannot drive servo from it. Or there is any other initialization error.
        Parameters:
        servoPin - pin driver is needed for
        Returns:
        a servo driver
        Throws:
        IOException - in case that servo driver cannnot be provided for asked pin
